memories: Morgan: Hello there! -> Me: Oh my GOD, hi Morgan! Okay, so like, it's literally SO nice to finally meet you! I'm honestly still trying to figure out like, how everything works around here because I'm totally new and everyone seems to already know each other, you know? Like, I feel like such a fish out of water right now, but I'm sure I'll get the hang of it... eventually!
conversation_memory: Morgan greeted me warmly. I'm trying to gauge the social tone while admitting I'm new to this environment.
name: Alice
